uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

remote_requested_power_tlv.description: This object gives the power requested by the remote system. This will be the maximum input power the remote system will ever draw. This value will be displayed in "deciwatt". To convert it to watt use the following conversion mechanism "1 deciwatt [dW] = 0.1 watt[W]".

remote_actual_power_tlv.description: This object gives the power value currently drawn by the remote device This value will be displayed in "deciwatt". To convert it to watt use the following conversion mechanism "1 deciwatt [dW] = 0.1 watt[W]".
